The American Can Company has purchased 2.62 million shares, or 9.2 percent, of the Lomas & Nettleton Financial Corporation, one of the nation's largest mortgage banking firms. In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, American Can said that it had purchased the Lomas shares as an investment.

American Can, a financial services concern based in Greenwich, Conn., told the S.E.C. that it ''intends to re-examine its investment in Lomas from time to time'' and may purchase or sell its shares. Between Feb. 3 and Feb. 13, American Can bought 1.30 million Lomas shares for prices ranging from $28.25 to $31.87 a share. The stake was purchased for a total of $73.71 million.
